cmp-cmdline nvim-cmp source for vim's cmdline. Setup Completions for search based on current buffer: Completions for command mode: For the buffer source to work, cmp-buffer is needed. Option ignorecmds: string Default: You can specify ignore command name. treattrailingslash: boolean Default: can return path items. unfortunately, that items has trailing slash so we don't narrowing with next directory with pressing . if you turned on this option, removes trailing slash automatically.
